[DaringHost.com](http://www.daringhost.com/) - We Dare To Be Different

**About Us**

We've decided to make our first LEB offer an exclusive to the users on this great website. You will not find this offer listed publicly on our website or another forum we advertise on.

Founded in April of 2010, DaringHost understands that the internet world never shuts down, it is running 24x7x365 without interruptions. This is why we believe in 24x7 support, to ensure that our customers receive the best support possible. We understand that your VPS needs to be online in order for your forum, blog, application, website, ect to be successful. This is why we offer a 99.99% uptime guarantee with all plans.

**DaringHost's LEB 2GB Ram Special (Limited Stock Available)**
